2164.subject: MPA
2164.descrlong:
Course will study production techniques using both analogue and digital technologies.  Students will study the recording, mixing and multi-tracking of live instruments and voice.  Intermediate audio theory, signal flow, acoustics, digital and analogue signal processing, and analysis of compositions will be studied.  Provides an introduction to the MTA 980 mixing console.  Each student must play an instrument or sing.  DIAGNOSTIC AUDITION REQUIRED.   (Offered spring semester)

(Prereq: MPA 102 and MPA 306 and Diagnostic Audition)
